00020 bool BodyActivityDialog::Initialize() {
00021         if (!BodyActivityModel::Initialize())
00022                 return false;
00023         m_initialized = true;
00024         return true;
00025 }
00026 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 void BodyActivityDialog::DeInitialize() {
00028         BodyActivityModel::DeInitialize();
00029 
00030         // Sales representatives histogram threshold
00031         m_SalesRepHistThreshold = 0.90;
00032 
00033         // Smoothing and dwell time detection
00034         m_pathSmoothSigma = 15;
00035         m_dwellTime       = 60;
00036         m_dwellAreaRadius = 100;
00037 }
00038 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 void BodyActivityDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00040 {
00041         CPropertyPage::DoDataExchange(pDX);
00042 
00043         // convert frames to seconds
00044         double sec_m_pathSmoothSigma, sec_m_dwellTime;
00045         if (!pDX->m_bSaveAndValidate) {
00046                 sec_m_pathSmoothSigma = doc->trackermodel.Frames2Seconds(m_pathSmoothSigma);
00047                 sec_m_dwellTime = doc->trackermodel.Frames2Seconds(m_dwellTime);
00048         }
00049 
00050         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_DWELLAREARADIUS, m_dwellAreaRadius);
00051         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_SALESREPTHRESHOLD, m_SalesRepHistThreshold);
00052         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PATHSMOOTHSIGMA, sec_m_pathSmoothSigma);
00053         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_DWELLTIME, sec_m_dwellTime);
00054         
00055         // convert seconds to frames
00056         if (pDX->m_bSaveAndValidate) {
00057                 m_pathSmoothSigma = doc->trackermodel.Seconds2Frames(sec_m_pathSmoothSigma);
00058                 m_dwellTime = doc->trackermodel.Seconds2Frames(sec_m_dwellTime);
00059         }
00060 
00061 }
00062 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 void BodyActivityDialog::Serialize( CArchive& ar ) {
00064         CObject::Serialize(ar);
00065         if( ar.IsStoring()) {
00066                 ar << m_SalesRepHistThreshold;
00067                 ar << m_pathSmoothSigma << m_dwellTime << m_dwellAreaRadius;
00068         }
00069         else {
00070                 ar >> m_SalesRepHistThreshold;
00071                 ar >> m_pathSmoothSigma >> m_dwellTime >> m_dwellAreaRadius;
00072         }
